text: Preeti Z Choudhry is an Indian journalist and anchor. She is host of the India Today channel debate 'To The Point' and other shows such as 'Motorcycle Diaries'. In 2014 she won a Ramnath Goenka Excellence in Journalism Award for her investigative reporting into Punjab's drug problem. In 2012 she won an Indian Television Academy Award for best news documentary. She has won two ENBA awards, one in 2014 for best current affairs program and one in 2012 for 'young professional of the year' award.
